Super Duper Graphics Pack Ceasing Development
å²è¯—å›¾å½¢åŒ…åœæ­¢å¼€å‘
A final update on the Super Duper pack
æœ‰å…³å²è¯—å›¾å½¢åŒ…æœ€åçš„æ¶ˆæ¯
Some of you might remember us announcing the Super Duper Graphics Pack during E3 2017. Super Duper was an ambitious initiative that brought a new look to Minecraft but, unfortunately, the pack proved too technically demanding to implement as planned.

We realise this is disappointing to some of you â€“ there was a lot of enthusiasm for Super Duper from inside and outside the studio â€“ but unfortunately, we arenâ€™t happy with how the pack performed across devices. For this reason, we're stopping development on the pack, and looking into other ways for you to experience Minecraft with a new look.

Minecraft is available on a wide range of platforms, and weâ€™re constantly trying to make the most of the technical architecture of each one. Weâ€™ll be able to share more on that subject very soon.

Thanks for your patience, and sorry for not following through on our plans!
